title: Pink Ward and Raptor Smite Bonus Bug
body: Has anyone noticed a bug when you smite Raptors and it gets burnt when you go close to a pink ward rather than a stealth ward? This has happened to me many times and no one has noticed but me.

replies.body:
Farsight Orb gives a ranged "%%%% you" to the raptor buff then...
10/10.

It shows when an enemy ward spots you, see where it doesnt say stealth ward.

RAPTORS

Grants "Razor Sharp," giving you a warning and Magical Sight (can spot invisible units) when an enemy ward spots you.
